content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Plate Production at position (52, -80)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position (52.0, -80.0)) 
-  Burner Inserter (position (53.5, -78.5)) that puts coal into the furnace
-  BeltGroup that connects the inserter to the furnace

### Iron Plate Production at position (62, -54)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position (62.0, -54.0)) 
-  No inserter or belt connected to this furnace

### Storage at position (52.5, -82.5)
Consists of a wooden chest

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from furnace
-  Make sure the furnace has produced the item before extracting it
-  Ensure the furnace has the required ingredients to produce the item

### Errors when using burner inserter
-  Make sure the inserter has enough fuel to operate
-  Ensure the inserter is correctly connected to the furnace and the belt

### NAMESPACE
*   No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
*   Important variables:
    *   `furnace1`: a furnace entity
    *   `Prototype.IronPlate`: the prototype of an iron plate item
    *   `coal`: the fuel used by the furnace and inserter
    *   `iron-plate`: the item being produced by the furnace
